page.title: 15VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: {Woodham Mortimer }supports a number of activities: a)playgroup and playbus; b)youth club;c)Brownies and Guides weekly in Village Hall;d)Young Wives- evening meeting and coffee morning monthly at members' homes;e)Cricket Club.Special events:Christmas bazaar, annual Pony Club,Essex Farmers Hunt. {Woodham Walter }many activities ceased due to lack of support:a)monthly British Legion meetings.b)Parent_ Teacher Association aid school with fundraising;c)Wives Group provides social outings,treasure hunts,netball and informative talks;d)Womens Club monthly meeting in own clubhouse. Social afternoons and informative evenings. e.g. hair care,flower arranging. Both villages have active Parish Councils.
